item.title: 铁矿石价格下跌，因库存增加及淡水河谷产量提升加剧供应担忧
item.description: 铁矿石价格连续第三日回落，因中国库存增加及巴西矿商淡水河谷产量超预期，加剧了市场对供应过剩的担忧。【原文：Iron ore retreated for a third day as increasing Chinese stockpiles and higher-than-expected output from Brazilian miner Vale SA added to concerns about oversupply.】

item.title: 智普股价飙升120%凸显中国人工智能市场新宠
item.description: 中国人工智能模型开发商智普科技的股价本周已翻倍，凸显出投资者对该国新兴生成式人工智能企业的浓厚兴趣，而与此同时，其他地区的老牌企业正面临估值重置。【原文：Shares of Chinese AI model developer Zhipu have more than doubled this week, underscoring investor appetite for the country’s emerging generative-AI firms even as established players elsewhere face a valuation reset.】

item.title: 据称泰国美乐国际正考虑为旗下餐饮业务在香港上市
item.description: 知情人士透露，亚洲最大酒店集团之一泰国美乐国际有限公司正考虑将其餐饮业务在香港首次公开募股。此时正值曼谷股市试图重振本土交易活动之际。【原文：Thailand’s Minor International Pcl, one of Asia’s largest hospitality groups, is considering a Hong Kong initial public offering for its restaurant business, people familiar with the matter said, at a time when Bangkok’s stock market tries to revive activity at home.】

item.title: 马来西亚GDP增速超预期，国家银行预计增长势头将持续
item.description: 马来西亚第四季度经济增速超出预期，巩固了其作为东南亚最具韧性增长引擎之一的地位。【原文：Malaysia’s economy grew faster than expected in the fourth quarter, solidifying its status as one of Southeast Asia’s most resilient growth engines.】

item.title: 邦查收购雪佛龙香港子公司，这家泰国企业正加速拓展亚洲业务
item.description: 邦查克集团宣布将以2.7亿美元收购雪佛龙在香港的燃料业务，这家泰国能源公司正加速推进海外扩张。【原文：Bangchak Corp. will acquire Chevron’s Hong Kong fuel business for $270 million as the Thai energy company accelerates its overseas expansion, it said.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德与新加坡政府投资公司为国家仓储交易寻求20亿美元贷款
item.description: 知情人士透露，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司与新加坡政府投资公司正寻求一笔27.7亿澳元（约合19.6亿美元）的贷款，用于支持收购悉尼上市的National Storage REIT。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. and Singapore’s GIC Pte are seeking a A$2.77 billion ($1.96 billion) loan to back the purchase of Sydney-listed National Storage REIT, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 花旗预计印尼企业将发行美元债券 尽管穆迪下调评级
item.description: 花旗集团预计，印尼企业今年仍将推进美元债券发行计划，尽管穆迪评级机构本月早些时候下调印尼政府信用评级展望的决定造成了冲击。【原文：Citigroup Inc. expects Indonesian corporates to push ahead with dollar bond sales this year, even after Moody’s Ratings’ decision to lower its outlook on the government’s credit score earlier this month came as a blow.】

item.title: 石峰资本旗下Synera公司为台湾风电场寻求8亿美元贷款
item.description: 知情人士透露，在台湾大力推动绿色电力供应扩容的背景下，石峰资本旗下投资组合公司Synera可再生能源公司正为其在台湾的离岸风电场项目寻求8亿美元的私募信贷。【原文：Synera Renewable Energy Co., a portfolio company of Stonepeak Partners, is seeking $800 million of private credit for its offshore wind farm project in Taiwan, according to people familiar with the matter, amid the push for green power supply expansion in the country.】

item.title: 力拓与必和必拓将引领澳大利亚企业盈利反弹
item.description: 澳大利亚财报季将于下周进入高潮，力拓集团和必和必拓集团的业绩表现被视为该国企业盈利复苏的关键指标。【原文：Australia’s reporting season moves into high gear next week with Rio Tinto Ltd. and BHP Group Ltd. seen crucial for the country’s earnings rebound.】

item.title: 铜价从抛售中反弹，因贸易放缓至中国假期
item.description: 周四铜价在下跌后反弹，此前风险资产（包括大宗商品）普遍遭遇抛售。【原文：Copper rebounded after a drop on Thursday that was spurred by a broad selloff across risk assets, including commodities.】

item.title: 央行对隔夜利率的日益关注引发政策转向讨论
item.description: 中国人民银行对隔夜货币市场利率的高度关注，正引发市场猜测其最终可能将此期限作为主要政策目标。【原文：The Chinese central bank’s heightened focus on the overnight money market rate is fueling speculation that it may eventually move toward adopting this tenor as its primary policy target.】

item.title: GDS支持的DayOne据称已选定银行为其50亿美元美国IPO承销
item.description: 据知情人士透露，DayOne数据中心有限公司已选定多家银行协助安排在美国首次公开募股，此次募资规模可能达到约50亿美元。【原文：DayOne Data Centers Ltd. has selected banks to help arrange a US initial public offering that may raise about $5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 俄罗斯或暂停降息，通胀风险日益加剧
item.description: 俄罗斯央行可能暂缓下调基准利率，因近期增税措施对政策制定者长期追求的通胀目标构成新的威胁。【原文：The Bank of Russia may hold off lowering its key interest rate as recent tax hikes pose a fresh threat to achieving policymakers’ long-sought inflation target.】

item.title: 逆势而行者浮现，印度科技股因人工智能颠覆担忧而暴跌
item.description: 订单流依然强劲，估值处于十年低位：MRG。【原文：Order flows for remain strong, and valuations are at decadal lows: MRG.】

item.title: 摩根大通基于美联储利率预期建议抛售两年期国债
item.description: 摩根大通公司策略师建议将抛售两年期美国国债作为一项"战术性"交易，理由是经济增长前景强劲，这将使美联储难以大幅降息。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. strategists recommended selling two-year US Treasuries as a “tactical” trade, citing a resilient growth outlook that will make it hard for the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates aggressively.】

item.title: 中国再度大举收购海外资产 从彪马到金属行业
item.description: 在被北京方面关闭近十年后，中国企业海外并购狂潮的大门再次敞开。【原文：After Beijing slammed them shut about a decade ago, the gates have flung open again for Chinese firms to go on overseas acquisition sprees.】

item.title: 中国神华获准进行190亿美元收购案
item.description: 中国监管机构已批准国内最大煤炭企业以1336亿元人民币（约合190亿美元）收购母公司资产的计划，此举旨在为煤炭消费趋于平稳之际提供缓冲。【原文：Chinese regulators have approved a plan for the country’s biggest coal miner to acquire 133.6 billion yuan ($19 billion) of assets from its parent firm, a move aimed at cushioning the company as coal consumption starts to plateau.】

item.title: 中国要求检测塞雷肽，雀巢、达能面临召回
item.description: 中国市场监管部门已要求婴幼儿配方奶粉生产商检测青霉素毒素，这种毒素曾导致全球多家大型食品企业实施预防性召回。【原文：China’s market regulator has ordered infant formula makers to test for cereulide, a toxin that has triggered precautionary recalls worldwide by some of the largest food companies.】

item.title: 澳联储警告：加息效应显现，澳大利亚人消费增速将放缓
item.description: 澳大利亚1月份消费者支出有所增长，网球赛事等夏季活动推动了消费，但借贷成本上升的预期可能在未来数月抑制消费增长势头。【原文：Australia’s consumer spending lifted in January, buoyed by tennis and other summer events, private data showed, though expectations of higher borrowing costs may curb momentum in the months ahead.】

item.title: 渣打银行警告后，比特币在亚洲承压
item.description: 亚洲周五加密货币持续承压，此前渣打银行警告比特币可能进一步走弱，而美国最大加密货币交易所第四季度转为亏损。【原文：Cryptocurrencies remained under pressure Friday in Asia after Standard Chartered warned of further Bitcoin weakness and the largest US crypto exchange swung to a loss in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 为何中国正进一步撤出美国国债
item.description: 这是全球最大的债务堆——规模达30万亿美元的美国国债市场。它是在外国央行和投资者的助力下建立起来的，这些机构无论经济顺境还是逆境都争相购买美国国债。但如果他们的购买意愿减弱，会发生什么？【原文：It’s the biggest pile of debt in the world — the $30 trillion US Treasuries market. It’s been built with the help of foreign central banks and investors, who have clamored to buy US government bonds through good times and bad. But what happens if their appetite wanes?】

item.title: 中国二手房价格跌幅收窄，释放积极信号
item.description: 中国二手房价格1月份跌幅收窄，为持续已久的房地产危机出现缓和态势带来一丝希望。【原文：China’s second-hand home prices fell at a slower pace in January, providing a glimmer of hope that the prolonged property crisis is easing.】

item.title: 分析师称人民币兑印度卢比有望延续涨势
item.description: 分析师指出，由于中印两国在货币管理方式上存在分歧，人民币兑卢比的升值趋势可能还将持续。【原文：The yuan’s rally against the rupee may have further to run, as authorities in India and China diverge in how they manage their currencies, according to analysts.】

item.title: 马来西亚反贪污委员会主席称愿意接受股票调查
item.description: 马来西亚反贪污委员会主席阿赞·巴基表示，对于政府设立的独立委员会就其持股事宜展开调查，他完全持开放态度。【原文：Malaysia’s anti-corruption chief Azam Baki said he’s fully open to being investigated by a government-established independent committee on matters related to his shareholding.】

item.title: 赤泽表示，日美在5500亿美元基金项目上存在巨大分歧
item.description: 日本经济产业大臣赤泽理生表示，尽管美日双方在最新一轮谈判中取得进展，但在5500亿美元投资机制框架下应优先资助哪些项目的问题上，两国仍存在较大分歧。【原文：The US and Japan remain far apart over which projects should be funded first under the framework of a $550 billion investment vehicle even as the two sides made progress in their latest round of talks, Japanese Trade Minister Ryosei Akazawa said.】

item.title: 日元有望创2024年以来最佳单周表现，因财政担忧暂告段落
item.description: 日元正朝着自2024年11月以来最大单周涨幅迈进，市场信心源于首相高市早苗的选举胜利将使其能够在扩大财政刺激的同时维持金融市场的信任。【原文：The yen is on track for its biggest weekly gain since November 2024 on confidence Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s election victory will allow her to expand fiscal stimulus while maintaining the trust of financial markets.】

item.title: 美国股市对人工智能的担忧引发全球资金涌向亚洲赢家
item.description: 华尔街对人工智能引发商业颠覆的担忧正转化为亚洲股市的福音，推动该地区主导行业供应链的领先芯片制造商需求激增。【原文：Wall Street’s fears of business disruption caused by artificial intelligence are turning into a blessing for Asian stocks, fueling demand for the region’s leading chipmakers that dominate the industry’s supply chain.】

item.title: 澳西太平洋银行警告：澳大利亚财政丰收现可与矿业繁荣相媲美
item.description: 西太平洋银行表示，澳大利亚经济正经历数十年来最大的结构性转变之一，公共支出膨胀至堪比2000年代矿业繁荣时期的水平。与此同时，针对财政计划规模及其对通胀影响的批评声浪日益高涨。【原文：Australia’s economy is undergoing one of its largest structural shifts in decades, with public spending swelling to levels that rival the mining boom of the 2000s, Westpac Banking Corp. said, as criticism mounts at the scale of fiscal programs and their impact on inflation.】

item.title: 日本前外汇局长认为日元将走强，因高市早苗立场明朗
item.description: 据日本前货币政策负责人称，随着投资者对首相高市早苗的财政立场有更清晰的认识，日元很可能走强。【原文：The yen is likely to strengthen as investors gain a clearer understanding of Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s fiscal stance, according to a former Japanese currency czar.】

item.title: 铂金海存续全球最佳股价表现，人工智能推动前景向好
item.description: 铠侠控股公司股价飙升15%，因人工智能需求激增助力这家日本芯片制造商发布超预期的业绩展望，巩固了其作为2026年全球表现最佳主要股票的地位。【原文：Kioxia Holdings Corp.’s shares surged 15% after soaring AI demand helped the Japanese chipmaker deliver a better-than-anticipated results outlook, cementing its position as the world’s best performing major stock of 2026.】
